snippet.title: Echoes of a Turnabout: Franziska von Karma - Demo Released!
snippet.description:
What's that? It seems it's time for "That's Karma! Franziska von Karma TV!" or rather... our announcement video that the demo of "Echoes of a Turnabout: Franziska von Karma" is now available to play for free on itch.io! Check it out!

https://teamsnowcone.itch.io/turnabout-echo

💫 What is "Echoes of a Turnabout"? 💫

When a heavy snowstorm suddenly shuts down the city, the Wright Anything Agency are snowed in at the detention center. Unable to begin their investigation to defend their newest client and old friend, Detective Dick Gumshoe, they reach out to someone who happens to already be there...

"Echoes of a Turnabout: Franziska von Karma" is an upcoming Ace Attorney fangame developed by Team Snowcone featuring Franziska von Karma as she investigates a mysterious murder at the Gatewater Imperial Hotel with the help of one Maya Fey! Demo has been released for Doujin Fest 2024! The full game is planned to be released in early 2025.

🍧 Who is Team Snowcone? 🍧

A team of developers working together to make an Ace Attorney fangame starring Franziska von Karma! Feel free to check us out on our itch.io page: https://teamsnowcone.itch.io !

Special thanks to SK-VA as the voice of Franziska von Karma in both this video and the demo! Check her out here: https://x.com/SnehaK_VA !

#aceattorney #aceattorneyseries #franziskavonkarma #fangame #visualnovels #itchio #videogames #mysterygame #murdermystery
